amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike Section 122.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to be used to finalize, implement, or enforce the Bureau of Land Management's proposed rule regarding Waste Prevention, Production Subject to Royalties and Resource Conservation published February 8, 2016.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 422).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Huffman.
